pSpider

Class RunThreadedSpider

  • java.lang.Object
    • pSpider.RunThreadedSpider

  • public class RunThreadedSpider
extends java.lang.Object
    This contains main and the declarations of the data structures to be shared by the 'Runnable' threads that get started.
    Author:
    shoop
